name: Crash Down
description:
You have crash landed on an inhospitable planet. Try to survive inside an alien infested chasm with limited ammo and health. Hopefully you can find your ship's SOS beacon to call for help!

Crash Down is a single level sci-fi shooter developed in UE4. The game is currently in an alpha release. If you are interesting in the game's development or have comments and questions, please feel free to comment on the game or contact me through my account. 

APLHA RELEASE NOTES:

We will be patching the game shortly after release. Known bugs and updates will be reported in the Devlog. 

Saving is currently bugged, but the level only takes a few minutes to complete. If you choose CONTINUE and not NEW GAME after your initial playthrough, you will not have to watch the opening video.
